titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 107th running of the Indianapolis 500 Mile Race and recognizing the race as "the greatest spectacle in racing".
A resolution commemorating the 107th running of the Indianapolis 500 Mile Race and recognizing the race as "the greatest spectacle in racing".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: This resolution commemorates the 107th running of the Indianapolis 500 Mile Race and recognizes that race as the greatest spectacle in racing.
